\section*{SUMMARY : }

\subsection*{I.Report of the Scheduled changes : }

\begin{itemize}
\item The list of changes from 1.X to 2.X are resumed \doxyref{api\_\-change}{p.}{api_change}\end{itemize}


\subsection*{II. How to compile }

\begin{itemize}
\item Compile :\begin{itemize}
\item follow gfal hello world tutorial to have an etics installation\item Install scons ( \tt{http://www.scons.org,} python script )\item checkout the source from the svn : git svn clone \tt{http://svnweb.cern.ch/guest/lcgutil/gfal}\item \char`\"{}cd CERNgfal\char`\"{}\item \char`\"{}scons \char`\"{}\item configure env vars ETICS\_\-WORKSPACE if asked.\end{itemize}
\item Compile tests :\begin{itemize}
\item Install python $>$=2.4\item Install scons\item execute \char`\"{}scons testing\char`\"{} in the CERNgfal dir\end{itemize}
\item Clean builds :\begin{itemize}
\item scons -c \end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
